actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a moratorium on Federal coal leasing.

summary.text: Establishes a moratorium on coal leasing on all federally owned coal lands and deposits of coal which are minable by surface mining operation. Provides that nothing in this Act shall be construed to affect valid coal leases entered into prior to the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a moratorium on Federal coal leasing.
